UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Long-Term Effect of a Nine Amino-Acid Antimicrobial Peptide AS-hepc3(48-56) Against Pseudomonas aeruginosa With No Detectable Resistance.
Literature.Author: Zhu D, Chen F, Chen Y-C, Peng H, Wang K-J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<2% Hemolysis=512 µM,Mouse hepatocytes AML12:<5% Cytotoxicity=80 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:<5% Cytotoxicity=80 µM
